This page on SteamDB lists all the Steam games tagged under 'Space Sim'. Space Sim is a genre that encompasses games that allow players to explore, navigate, and interact in virtual space environments. These games often feature realistic physics, complex ship controls, intricate space stations, expansive universes, and engaging narratives that transport players to the vastness of outer space. Players can engage in activities such as trading, mining, piracy, exploration, combat, and diplomacy. The immersive nature of Space Sim games offers an exciting and unique gaming experience for those who love the thrill of space travel and discovery.
